markdownRemark.html: Located in Bennahavís near Marbella, it comprises 3 separate 9-hole courses, which are quite different in their design and nature. The good thing about there being 3 fields is that you can change the order of play in that you can combine A & C, B and so on which means you never play the same combination. This makes for an interesting round. The clubhouse is also exceptional, located on top of the mountain with a furnished terrace with exceptional views of Nueva Andalucia, Marbella and the Mediterranean beyond. The Clubhouse also offers activities such as a gym, paddle-tennis courts, a swimming pool, squash courts, Turkish baths and a therapy and beauty centre.

frontmatter.title: La Quinta Golf & Country Club
frontmatter.description: La Quinta Golf & Country Club - Located in Bennahavís near Marbella, it comprises of 3 separate 9-hole courses, which are quite different in their design and nature. The good thing about there being 3 fields is that you can change the order of play in that you can combine A & C, B and so on which means you never play the same combination. This makes for an interesting round. The clubhouse is also exceptional, located on top of the mountain with a furnished terrace with exceptional views of Nueva Andalucia, Marbella and the Mediterranean beyond. The Clubhouse also offers activities such as a gym, paddle-tennis courts, a swimming pool, squash courts, Turkish baths and a therapy and beauty centre.
frontmatter.address: Urb. La Quinta Golf, Marbella-Bennahavís, 29679 Málaga, Spain
frontmatter.price: Highest green fee weekdays 125.00 euros, Highest green fee weekends 125.00 euros
